title: Strategies for Forming Multicultural Team Learning Relationships: Applying Team-Based Learning and Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher foreign language proficiency and basic understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: Language curriculum for corporate managers/leaders to strengthen multicultural team collaboration, combining online (30%) and offline (70%) activities with learning data collection/analysis via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher task completion rate with multicultural team members within six months
Learners can visualize team learning networks and analyze correlations between cultural similarities and learning outcomes
Learners execute strategies to successfully mediate cultural conflicts occurring during team activities at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
